remarks: Definition of the hom-set extractor for arrows, which tags the morphisms of the underlying hom-set with domain and codomain, which can then be extracted using ~ df-doma and ~ df-coda .  (Contributed by FL, 6-May-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
df-homa $p |- HomA = ( c e. Cat |-> ( x e. ( ( Base ` c ) X. ( Base ` c ) ) |-> ( { x } X. ( ( Hom ` c ) ` x ) ) ) ) $.
$d c x $.
